bot_values.activity: Happily serving the Lillac Lullaby community.

OU-4000-1C.name: Order Log SQL Error
OU-4000-1C.description:
There was an error in one of the SQL executions regarding order logging. 
Send this error log to a Dev alongside a timestamp.

OU-4000-2C.name: Orders NullPointerException
OU-4000-2C.description:
While trying to grab the order numbers from the SQL database the value returned null.
This is bot operation critical. Report it to a Dev alongside a timestamp.

GO-4000-1C.name: Orders Query SQL Error
GO-4000-1C.description: While attempting to grab an order's number status there was a SQL issue. Please report this to a Dev.

GX1.name: Generic Error
GX1.description: A generic error within the code has occured. Report this to Dev.

DC-4API-OR.name: Discord API Error | Orders
DC-4API-OR.description: There was an error executing the action on behalf of the discord API.
